Class HTMLSelectFieldRenderer

java.lang.Object
  |

        +--com.taursys.xml.render.SelectFieldRenderer
              |
              +--com.taursys.html.render.HTMLSelectFieldRenderer
public class HTMLSelectFieldRenderer
extends SelectFieldRenderer

Subcomponent which can render a value from a SelectField to a DOM Element as a TextNode.

Method Detail

render

public void render(SelectField field)
            throws RenderException
Deprecated. - use constructor that takes a SelectField as parameter and render that takes no parameters.

Renders the given SelectField to a Text Node of Element in a Document. This component accesses the given textField's parent to obtain the DocumentAdapter. It also accesses the given field's id and model. It uses the DocumentAdapter's setElementText to render the model's text value to the Element indicated by the id.
Overrides:
render in class SelectFieldRenderer
Throws:
RenderException - if any problem occurs during rendering

render

public void render()
            throws RenderException
Renders the given SelectField to a Text Node of Element in a Document. This component accesses the given textField's parent to obtain the DocumentAdapter. It also accesses the given field's id and model. It uses the DocumentAdapter's setElementText to render the model's text value to the Element indicated by the id.
Overrides:
render in class SelectFieldRenderer
Throws:
RenderException - if any problem occurs during rendering
